feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update umami to v2.16.1 by @SkyfallWasTaken in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1348
  • fixes typo outline->getoutline #1352 by @sondreal in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1357
  • fix: fixed highligh search terms color by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1349
  • feat: add Mailpit template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1341
  • feat(template): add Wiki.js by @Cohvir in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1346
  • feat: add Linkwarden template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1354
  • feat: add Pocket ID template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1356
  • refactor: update glance template by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1340
  • Remove permit root login advice by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1360
  • Feat: Organizations & Better auth by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1351
  • feat: notifications to specific Telegram topics by @vicke4 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1314
  • fix(templates): listmonk needed files volumes by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1376
  • Kucherenko/canary by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1383
  • fix(database): ensure adminId is not null for certificates, notificat… by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1385
  • Feat/AI by @kucherenko in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1384
  • fix(sidebar): now the sidebar will not open when the browser reloads or navigate between routes
  • feat(deployments): improve deployment list display and cleanup logic by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1387

Note

If you receive login related problems after upgrading such as Invalid Origin or other errors we recommend clearing cookies & localstorage, and refreshing the page.

Breaking Changes

  • Resources which were created in Git Providers, SSH Keys, Registry & Destinations before v0.11.0 Will automatically delete this is due to migration to better auth, so you will need to recreate.
  • 2FA Auth will need to recreate

Features

Organizations

Now you are able to create multiple organizations and isolated resources to specific organizations

AI

Now you can generate docker compose applications based on your prompt!

API Keys Redesign

Now you can generate API Keys based on specific organization and customization as rate-limiting

Cloud Version

Now the cloud users can login via Github or Google Authentication

New 2FA Flow

Due to integration of 2FA from better auth we decided to migrate to make it more flexible, if you have previously setup 2FA you will need to setup again.

New Contributors

  • @sondreal made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1357
  • @Cohvir made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1346
  • @vicke4 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1314

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.18.4...v0.19.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(gitlab): update repository filtering and connection testing by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1422
  • feat(destinations): add createdAt timestamp and display creation date by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1424
  • fix: breadcrumbs UX by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1411
  • feat: add Hoarder template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1355
  • feat(template): DataLens by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1415
  • refactor: remove unnecessary extra shadow from monitoring page by @vinumzz in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1417
  • feat(zipline): update zipline version by @hexaaagon in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1390
  • fix(template): superset by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1414
  • feat: fallback to openai compatible provider if url host doesn't match by @frostming in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1405
  • feat: reorganize project view tabs into logical workflow groups #1261 by @ali-issa in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1392
  • feat(monitoring): add date range filtering and log cleanup scheduling by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1430
  • refactor(docker): sort container lists by name by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1432
  • refactor(ui): improve environment code editor styling and layout by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1433
  • feat(ui): add tooltips to service action buttons for improved user gu… by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1434
  • feat(services): add bulk service move functionality across projects by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1435
  • feat(services): add bulk delete functionality for services by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1436
  • 700 reorganize services order by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1437
  • feat(environment): add unsaved changes handling for environment settings by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1438
  • fix(ui): update switch component background color for unchecked state by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1439
  • feat(databases): add database rebuild functionality by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1440
  • fix(frontend): update isolated deployment label for clarity by @eni4sure in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1441
  • feat(domains): add custom certificate resolver support by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1442
  • feat(applications): add watch paths for selective deployments by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1443
  • Database empty backups fix by @Gity37 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1431
  • fix(ui): Autocomplete by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1445
  • fix(ui): sorting by @gentslava in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1447
  • Feat/latest n backups by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1446
  • refactor(traefik): migrate from Docker Swarm service to standalone container and integrate http3 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1371
  • feat(ui): add Docker Compose file editor autocomplete by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1448
  • Feat/migration templates by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1450

Breaking Changes

Due to issue #1345 it was necessary to migrate from traefik service to standalone docker container, so when you upgrade you may have downtimes or crashes due to the recreation of the container, additionally the templates will have to be deployed again to update the references of the new traefik container.

If you experience problems starting your instance please run this command on your server first curl -sSL https://dokploy.com/install.sh | sh -s update If that doesn't work run

docker service scale dokploy=0 docker service scale dokploy=1

Features

  • HTTP3 Traefik

For new installations will be enabled by default, for existing installations you will need to add this to your traefik.yml

diff entryPoints: web: address: ':80' websecure: address: ':443' + http3: + advertisedPort: 443 http: tls: certResolver: letsencrypt

  • Watch Paths:

Now you can especify a watch paths to trigger deployments based on changes based on a directory

  • New Templates System

Now we migrate the templates to a different repository, so the templates will no longer depend on dokploy releases.

https://github.com/Dokploy/templates

Also for easy integration you can now import templates from the web by copying a base64 and importing in the advanced area and uploading all the information, this way you can test it quickly without waiting for releases.

  • Rebuild Database Now you don't have to create a new database, you can delete the information in one click and start from scratch.

  • Keep specific backups in your bucket Now you can specify a quantity of backups you want to keep in your bucket

New Contributors

  • @laem made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1285
  • @vinumzz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1417
  • @hexaaagon made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1390
  • @frostming made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1405
  • @eni4sure made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1441
  • @Gity37 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1431

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.19.1...v0.20.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: handle race condition when migrating swarm service to standalone traefik container

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.20.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: truncate domain overflow for external links by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1458
  • refactor: update project name reference in compose template processing by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1459
  • feat(templates): support array-based environment variable configuration by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.20.1...v0.20.2
